agendas.projectName: Palm Beach County Convention Center Expansion

headers.projectName: Palm Beach County Convention Center Expansion

estimateOverviews.notes: Fee at 5%. Buyout target reflects aggressive sub pricing from BC coverage.

prerequisites.label: Estimate File Complete
prerequisites.description: Estimate file has been reviewed and finalized by the Lead Estimator.

prerequisites.label: Contract Executed
prerequisites.description: Owner contract has been fully executed and filed.

prerequisites.label: Job Number Assigned
prerequisites.description: Official job number has been issued by Accounting.

prerequisites.label: Site Visit Completed
prerequisites.description: Operations team has completed an initial site visit.

prerequisites.label: Estimate File Complete
prerequisites.description: Estimate file has been reviewed and finalized by the Lead Estimator.

prerequisites.label: Contract Executed
prerequisites.description: Owner contract has been fully executed and filed.

prerequisites.label: Job Number Assigned
prerequisites.description: Official job number has been issued by Accounting.

prerequisites.label: Site Visit Completed
prerequisites.description: Operations team has completed an initial site visit.

discussionItems.label: Scope of Work
discussionItems.description: Review the full scope of work, inclusions, and exclusions.
discussionItems.notes: Full scope reviewed including 150,000 SF expansion, new ballroom, and parking structure. Self-perform concrete and site work.

discussionItems.label: Budget & Cost Review
discussionItems.description: Walk through the estimate, GC costs, contingencies, and fee structure.
discussionItems.notes: GMP at $42M. GC costs at 8.2%. Contingency at 1.5%. Fee locked at 5%.

discussionItems.label: Schedule Overview
discussionItems.description: Review project milestones, critical dates, and long-lead items.
discussionItems.notes: 18-month construction schedule. Long-lead: curtain wall (16 weeks), elevators (20 weeks). Substantial completion by Q3 2027.

discussionItems.label: Subcontractor Strategy
discussionItems.description: Discuss subcontractor selections, bid coverage, and procurement plan.
discussionItems.notes: 6 major trades identified. MEP package going to 3 bidders each. Concrete self-perform confirmed.

discussionItems.label: Risk Items
discussionItems.description: Identify known risks, allowances, exclusions, and potential change orders.
discussionItems.notes: Soil conditions flagged — geotech report shows potential dewatering needs. $350K allowance for unforeseen conditions.

discussionItems.label: Contract Requirements
discussionItems.description: Review key contract terms, insurance, bonding, and compliance requirements.
discussionItems.notes: 100% P&P bond required. CCIP program in place. Liquidated damages at $5K/day.

discussionItems.label: Safety Considerations
discussionItems.description: Discuss site-specific safety concerns and safety plan requirements.
discussionItems.notes: Active convention center adjacent — need full perimeter fencing and separate construction entrance. Noise restrictions after 6PM.

discussionItems.label: Quality Requirements
discussionItems.description: Review quality standards, special inspections, and testing requirements.
discussionItems.notes: County-mandated third-party inspections for structural steel. LEED Silver target.

discussionItems.label: Client Expectations
discussionItems.description: Discuss client communication preferences, reporting, and relationship dynamics.
discussionItems.notes: Monthly OAC meetings. Weekly progress reports to County PM. Client prefers email over Teams.

discussionItems.label: Open Items & Action Items
discussionItems.description: Capture outstanding questions, open items, and next steps for the team.
discussionItems.notes: 1) Finalize dewatering scope by 1/20. 2) Confirm curtain wall vendor by 1/25. 3) Schedule pre-con meeting with County.
